There are potentially serious concerns about the long-term safety of the@Space_Station. Some parts of it are simply getting too old and obviously that risk grows over time. Even though@SpaceXearns billions of dollars from transporting astronauts & cargo to the ISS, I nonetheless would like to go on record recommending that it be de-orbited within 2 years.

Unused Software License Update!@USDAsaved $14M/yr by removing 6,323 unused PowerApps (20,708 to 14,385), 2,549 Team Domestic Calling licenses (8,412 to 5,863), 822 Project Planners (2,116 to 1,294) and 2,335 Visio licenses (4,987 to 2,652).@NASAsaved ~$500k/yr by removing 2,500 unused Office licenses (60,000 to 57,500).

We just completed the largest solar + battery project in the Caribbean — on Jumby Bay Island, Antigua. 🇦🇬 🌎 A massive 233.28 kW@teslaenergySolar Roof, powered by 9 inverters and 9@SolArkSolarL3-HV-40KWH battery stacks (that’s 72 battery modules!). This project was no joke — and it’s exactly what separates Good Faith Energy from the rest. Our roofing and electrical crews worked 15 days straight to complete Phase 2, backed by the relentless support of our sales, engineering, and project management teams. This was a full-team effort, start to finish. 💪 It’s officially up and running — and it’s just the beginning. We’re bringing solar resilience to the Caribbean one rooftop at a time. 🎥 Subscribe on YouTube — the full project video is dropping soon.
